name: No Phones In Class!
description:
No Phones In Class!

No Phones In Class! is a survival game where you have to hold back your laughter and sleep during a long exam in addition to preventing your teacher from catching you using your phone.

HOW TO PLAY?

Just make sure your teacher doesn't catch you using your phone

Controls

 Just use the cursor or your fingers!

Game participating in the "Sexy Boy Game Jam"

My Youtube Page 👀

It will be available soon for Android!
